com.davidbracewell

Class DynamicEnum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.DynamicEnum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class DynamicEnum
extends Object
implements Serializable

    Acts a global repository for dynamically generated EnumValues. Each EnumValue acts like a Java enum that can have elements created at runtime. Most interactions should be done with EnumValue implementations.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • isDefined

        public static boolean isDefined(@NonNull
                                Class<? extends EnumValue> enumClass,
                                @NonNull
                                String name)

        Determines if the specified name is a defined value of the specified EnumValue class}.

        Parameters:
        enumClass - Class information for the EnumValue that we will check.
        name - the name of the specified value
        Returns:
        True if the specified value has been defined for the given EnumValue class
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either the enumClass or name are null

      • valueOf

        public static <T extends EnumValue> T valueOf(@NonNull
                                              Class<T> enumClass,
                                              @NonNull
                                              String name)

        Returns the constant of the given EnumValue class with the specified name.The normalized version of the specified name will be matched allowing for case and space variations.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific type of EnumValue being looked up
        Parameters:
        enumClass - Class information for the EnumValue that we will check.
        name - the name of the specified value
        Returns:
        The constant of enumClass with the specified name
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified name is not a member of enumClass.
        NullPointerException - if either the enumClass or name are null

      • register

        public static <T extends EnumValue> T register(@NonNull
                                               T enumValue)

        Attempts to register a given EnumValue instance to its associated class type. If an instance with the same name has already been registered, that instance will be returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific type of EnumValue being registered
        Parameters:
        enumValue - the value to register
        Returns:
        the previously defined EnumValue with specified name and type or the one passed into register
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if enumValue is null
